website_summaries.verdict: Made for consumers who dislike cleaning and scooping, this pricey, complex box is a solid product.
pros: Washable granules eliminate the need for litter
cons: Setup requires cold water and electrical hookups
Not ideal for homes with more than two cats

website_summaries.verdict: The unit requires a water line and disposal drain, but the result is cleaner, less offensive litter. Expensive, but addresses many litter box issues cat owners have.
pros: Breaks down completely for thorough maintenance
Completely self-contained process, from collection to flushing to drying
cons: Significant amount of litter can get flushed away
Very long cleaning cycle, cats cannot return to box
Litter does not clump, but can be tracked through house

customer_reviews.title: Cooks your poo, helps you practice troubleshooting
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time, cheap internals, makes your house smell even worse. Call customer service and they'll tell you to redo everything you just did because it's expensive for them to fix. Oh boo hoo, you should've made a better product then. Congrats, you just bought a beeping swamp terrarium. UPDATE: Spent hours cleaning and troubleshooting for error 1. Exhausted troubleshooting guide and called customer service. Blown off. Got mad and hit random sequence of buttons. Turd convection oven magically working again. Let's see how many days that lasts. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Good concept. Product lacking.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very disappointing. When it works it is nice, but clogs often. Washable granules need to be replaced very frequently, as a good number wind up in the drain each cycle. Going to get expensive. Have 2 cats but only one uses it. One cycle a day. On second box of granules in 2 months. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money of a bad product and even worse customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 4 months ago. I have not been able to use it for the last month and have had to call their service folks several times trying to get it to work. They refuse to repair the item or honor their 2 year warranty because I purchased the item through Amazon. I am seriously disappointed with the product and outraged with their service and lack of ownership. Do not purchase this product or you will be wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Wyendie

customer_reviews.title: Really good product... until it fails
customer_reviews.text: The cat genie is a great idea and it’s an amazing product.. until it’s not. It takes away the daily maintenance of a cleaning the cat box but when it fails it fails very catastrophically. During normal operation the only real complaint I have is the smell is very bad while it’s cleaning, but twice now it’s failed (water sensor one time, stuck water open valve another time) and flooded my (2nd floor) apartment causing quite a lot of damage and a very bad smell that won’t go away. I can’t say that I recommend this product, I would rather scoop daily than deal with it flooding my apartment with cat waste water even just once
customer_reviews.author: Bond Kellam

customer_reviews.title: But it is awesome. No more changing litter
customer_reviews.text: Talk about 1st world problems. I can't believe I spent this much on a Cat toilet. But it is awesome. No more changing litter. I even built a nice little room under the stairs. The hoses pass through the back wall right where the Washer and dryer hookups are. Bonus. Definitely recommend both the dome cover and a mat that will catch the litter off their paws. This way it can be dumped right back in the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nicolodi

customer_reviews.title: Very well and good intentioned machined with a few improvements to be made
customer_reviews.text: Very well and good intentioned machined with a few improvements to be made. Pros: Mostly does a good job of keeping cat odors at bay by scooping up cat poop and pee. Cons; Very large and requires dedicated power and cold water source Dryer function can make the whole house reek of a cat poop bake Poor or retrograded user interface system that needs to be updated Constructed materials do not hold well over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CatGenie
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning this was great. I went through more boxes of litter used in this machine. All that plastic litter was going down drain, which plugged up. Went through 2 motors, they replaced the first no problem, the second I threw it out and bought a Litter Robot, best investment I have made in litter contraptions. The scoop on the catgenie was continually covered with poop.
customer_reviews.author: Trag

customer_reviews.title: NOT PERFECT BUT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Sure this thing isnt perfect like alot of comments say but i have to say Cat Piss took alot of litter with regular litter box & it always ended up getting stuck 2 the bottom of the litter box which is disgusting to shovel out but with this catgenie the pee goes down and drains out, yea the thing stinks up a bit when its starting up to wash. (I manually press the button to wash everyday when the cats r asleep). but when it stinks just light a candle, its a hell of a lot better dealing with this than dealing with clumped piss that costs alot of money in litter.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Loved the box for the first six months
customer_reviews.text: Loved the box for the first six months. Then the cost of the granules and cartridges started adding up. Then when the machine breaks down and you have to clean the interior it is one of the most disgusting things in the world. Then the worst happened it stopped knocking the litter off during the cleaning process and in two days dumped half the litter down the drain. Then the mechanicals arm broke. Guess what, I'm three months out of warranty. At first it was great, then the price became two high.
customer_reviews.author: Delhi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service, I Will be returning it. After several phone calls trying to explain that something is wrong with it because as soon as my cat goes inside the thing starts leaking under, they expect me to lift it make videos or pics and find out what it is wrong. I'm tired of cleaning cat pee from the floor, the cat is not spraying since I also got the dome, try several calls and it was impossible to get a replacement will be returning it. I has a catgenie years ago, i know how thwy work this should not be happening
customer_reviews.author: Bethy A.

customer_reviews.title: This is also doodoo nugget air fryer.
customer_reviews.text: Has anyone experienced the horror when an overwhelming odor of poo fills up your whole house faster than popcorn in an air-popper because a tiny nugget of poo got left behind––unbelievably because this device is the best on the market for cleanliness. But, if a breadcrumb size piece of doodoo gets left behind in the pellets (which look like dry pasta) for the dryer cycle, then omg, my windows are all open and there is no stopping every crevice and cranny of your home from being poo-air-bombed.
customer_reviews.author: ginevra wilson

customer_reviews.title: Update. I have had this cat Genie for about ...
customer_reviews.text: Update. I have had this cat Genie for about a year now. I have had to send the unit back and now it has broken again. I have gone back to a regular litter box because it's just Too much of a hassle to keep this thing working. Plus you have to keep up with ordering the supplies. the granules and the solution.
customer_reviews.author: karen w.

customer_reviews.title: 2 large cats, tired of heavy litter and a mess
customer_reviews.text: Still in the "try out" process. Very easy to install. Setting up night pause is a little confusing. Run (clean) cycle is very long. Make sure you take all the time the cats need to get used to new litter box. The hints pamphlet is a great help but use common sense also, We set old and new almost opening to opening for a couple days then covered old box with a cardboard "cover" worked very well. And "yuck" plant a turd from each cat in new box.
customer_reviews.author: Pops64Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: needs hookups
customer_reviews.text: stupid me bought this thinking it had internal water and waste storage like a camper potty. nope, has to be attached to water and sewer. sent that back before i ever opened the box. it is huge too. the picture does not show the actual size. the box that arrived at my house was like an actual toilet box! lol
customer_reviews.author: Vicki S. Cadieux

customer_reviews.title: No More Spilled Cat Litter From Torn Garbage Bags
customer_reviews.text: CatGenie lives up to the hype. I haven’t had to deal with spilled spoiled litter in over two months. Cleans very well and takes less than 25 minutes for a cycle. I use mine manually once per day with 2 cats. If it’s the price your worried about then think about how much you will save from not having to buy cat litter. In about a year or so it has paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for cat owners ever.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. One of the best investments I’ve made. With my wife being pregnant and me hating cleaning the cat box, this was the perfect solution. The fresh scent cartridge is a little strong but is much more pleasant than dirty cat box. My cat adjusted to the new box very easily we just follow the instructions, and after about a week we took the old cat box away. She was using the new one like clockwork. Definitely need a mat for under the opening. Just like normal cat litter it goes everywhere when the cat jumps out. But you can scoop it up and put it back in the box during a cleaning cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tylor Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Please read
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for a little the granuals go everywhere and gets clogged often the plug melted the extension cord to my floor almost set my house on fire
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Gunz

customer_reviews.title: Broke then clogged
customer_reviews.text: Ours broke after a few months, shortly after the 90 day warranty of course. The arm wouldn't move. The company sent us a new processing unit which fixed the issue, but shortly after that it turned out the drain hose was completely clogged with granules. I stopped using it because there is no way I'm going through the process of unclogging the hose every couple weeks or months. When it clogged, I had a tub of putrid fluid to somehow get out of my litter box area. It was absolutely disgusting. Now I'm out $300 and back to scooping litter from a regular box.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L Mark

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED MY LIFE 4 CATS HAVE 2 OF THESE
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING PERIOD BUY IT NOW GAME CHANGER! I HAD A DIRTY HOUSE PISSER THAT WAS TERRITORY SHY AND WAS "MARKING" AND NOW THAT I HAVE 2 GOING ONE WITH THE DOME AND ONE WITHOUT SHE IS BACK TO USING THE LITTER BOX AND IM BACK TO *****NEVER CLEANING UP CAT LITTER OR PEE OF POOP AGAIN****
customer_reviews.author: Tom Darren South

customer_reviews.title: Just a waste of $200
customer_reviews.text: We have had this since October and it's December. The thing beeps with error messages all the time and is currently filling with water flooding my house. I think this was the most expensive mistake I've ever made. Don't buy it. tech support isn't helpful and there is no option to return. Just a waste of $200!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This automatic litter box works perfectly. We don't use the sensor, rather we manually trigger a cleaning once per day. It sanitizes the litter and dries it completely, making my cat very happy. There are only 2 downsides, which is why I only gave it 4 stars. First is the cost, which is a tad on the high side, IMO. Second is how long it takes to run, over an hour. If I run it at night before I go to bed, the waste from it has to sit in the toilet until I wake up in the morning to flush it. While not the end of the world, it's a bit of a turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months company won't take back
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy! Spend the extra money and get the Litter Robot. My cat genie worked about 3 weeks before clogging for the first time. We unclogged. It worked for 2 days, clogged. Then kept that up for a few weeks, until it finally decided to just cycle for an hour, but not drain. I contacted the company and they said they would take it back if it were new and unused. Obviously it's not unused or I wouldn't know it's broken. So it's sitting in my hallway, cleaned out, and looking weird. I replaced it with the Litter Robot which is freaking awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for A Good Tale...

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, just a few problems
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about a week, then it began leaking from the bottom. We tried to troubleshoot exactly where the leak was coming from so we could seal it, but nothing has worked as of yet. Also, the eye that's supposed to see if the cat tries to enter during a cleaning cycle so it can stop the cleaning failed, and I watched my cat get scared thinking it was attacking him - as it didn't stop when he tried to enter. He won't go near it now, so back to the old litter box.
customer_reviews.author: KJW

customer_reviews.title: Way too much money for a poop bake
customer_reviews.text: This thing works for 1 week. Then every time it runs it will make your entire house smell like baked cat poop. I don't have a small house, and its way in the back of the upstairs bathroom with the door pulled almost completely closed. Its awful. The idea is very good. I never had any leaks or anything. But it doesn't even get all the poop out of the litter. And the litter gets EVERYWHERE. Its all over my house. I absolutely do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Z

customer_reviews.title: Took a risk and paid off big time
customer_reviews.text: I live in CR so I took a big risk buying this product that has no local representation. I had to pay extra shipping, additional taxes and now I rely on my traveling to the US to buy the cartridges. Even with all that, getting the Cat Genie was one of the best and boldest decision Ive ever made. I’ve had it for year and a half now and continue to work wonderfully. Hadnt had to replace any part and just clean the plastic thingy every once in a while and run the maintenance cartridge here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea T.

customer_reviews.title: it still smelled like baking cat poop
customer_reviews.text: 6 months, despite regular routine cleaning it has died. No matter how many times we cleaned it, it still smelled like baking cat poop. Also it would constantly error out and trying to get in touch with the website just told us we had to ship it at cost and they wouldn't cover it under warranty. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie k

customer_reviews.title: Cats wouldn't use...
customer_reviews.text: Love this item except that none of my 4 cats would use it. Tried every suggestion in the instructions and online, but no luck. The good news is that I have gotten permission to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Moots

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! I've purchased three of these. One was a gift to my sister. I purchased the newest model the "Ai" which turned out to be a piece of junk. I understand sometimes a dud gets past QC but their customer service is a joke. They make you jump through all kinds of hoops to keep from having to honor a warranty. In the meantime my cats have nowhere to potty because there's water standing in this thing. I'm heading back to the littermaid which I always had good results and the kitties will be much happier. DON'T BUY THIS UNLESS YOU WANT TO FLUSH $300.
customer_reviews.author: Alamomikel

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great idea
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great idea, but it leaks terribly. Bought this for a gift and only found out months later that they haven't been able to use it without a big tray to catch the water. I was hoping to make the daily chore of cat litter duty a little easier for them, but now they are stuck emptying the tray of water every day. The hoses were installed correctly, but the hose fittings are leaking where they connect to the hose. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney J. Turman

customer_reviews.title: Good litter box
customer_reviews.text: We have one cat & have used the cat genie w/ lid for a few years now. We really like it. Our cat gets only a very small amount of litter on the floor, so cleanup is minimal & fast. The only con is when it’s cleaning itself it puts off a weird smell but if we flush the toilet right after it’s done draining & keep the bathroom door closed with the fan on, the smell is usually gone after about hour. Overall I would never go back to a regular litter box.
customer_reviews.author: DanNAmanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is our second unit. It works as advertised. Our old one lasted about 5 years and developed an overheat problem which could not be corrected. I had about 4 days between the old unit breaking and the new unit arriving and I forgot how much scooping litter sucks. We have two cats and the cleaning solution lasts about 2 months. I get about 6-8 months out of a box of granules. Great product that is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of it after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: When I first set it up I thought it would be the answer. I have 2 cats and they seemed to adjust well. Then the problems started after about 3 months I had problems with it draining, with it drying and incessantly beeping every time it quit working. My older cat didn't like the way it smelled if feces were cooked by it instead of removed from it and started going beside it. More trouble than it was worth.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Dollahan

customer_reviews.title: if your looking for a poo granule dispenser for your house, look no further
customer_reviews.text: To keep this concise, the granules get everywhere in the house because they're too light, stick to the cat, and then fall off at random places as the cat moves throughout the house. I'm sure this works well for the company selling additional boxes of granules, but we bought this to make things cleaner, not spread the mess everywhere. We installed ours in the basement, and found granules in the beds on the second floor and everywhere in between. We're no longer using the system.
customer_reviews.author: A real profile, not one paid to provide reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very nice overall wish there was a bit easier of a settings for different times of runs
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty nice. Granules really stick to cats paws, not any really good option to stop that with regular kitty litter but this is even lighter and sticks easier it seems. Only get the fresh scent cleaner!! Without it if the scoops ever miss tiny pieces the smell can become almost over powering... fresh scent helps tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I would like it. The first day the room ranked of kitty poop. If it doesn't get all the poop it just stinks so bad. I go back and get left over poop and run it once more to get the smell out. I love the Genie. No more litter boxes or bags of poop!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Horn

customer_reviews.title: I WILL NEVER OWN ANYTHING ELSE!!  WORTH EVERY PENNY!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in awe of the person who invented this fantastic self cleaning cat box! I will never again own anything else! I can enjoy my cat without dealing with the mess! It is always fresh and clean!! My cat is 6 months old. She was just spayed and declawed. Was able to use it right after surgeries!! She had no issues at all!! Got the dome also and very thankful I did. Granules stay in the box except what little she tracks out!! WORTH EVERY PENNY!! Thank You CatGenie!!
customer_reviews.author: Rev Deb

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Works great and the cats got used to it fairly quickly. Make sure to follow the quarterly cleaning instructions to avoid any unnecessary clogging (and a fairly disgusting cleanup job after) and that the “out” line doesn’t have to work hard through a too high placed tube. Roughly 4ft seems optimum, anymore can break the pump it seems. Saved a lot of money on an older model, enough to warrant a second purchase when a mishap managed to break the old one. Worth every penny, and especially with a cat that refuses to use a box with only one clump in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Never scoop poop again!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend this much on a litter box, but the promise of never having to scoop cat poop again was enticing. It was easy to set up and my cat is absolutely FASCINATED by watching it clean! She started using it right away and I have not had to deal with cat messes since. My only complaint is that it is a little small for a multi-cat household--I wish there was a larger size you can order, but this is the only size available currently. Also, the scented cartridge is a bit too strong. I have ordered the unscented for the refill.
customer_reviews.author: Arielynn Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this overpriced litter box to anyone! The set up was an absolute PAIN the hook up for the laundry room leaked terribly so we had to hook up in a spare bathroom. The smell this litter box puts off is atrocious! If I am spending $200+ on a self flushing litter box I was expect there to be no smell... instead it filled my entire house with the smell of horrible cat feces. We un hooked this and went back to a regular litter box and the smell was gone instantly! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian McDonald

customer_reviews.title: manufacturers guarrentee not honored
customer_reviews.text: i have 3 kittens and the litter is too rough and big for them contacted the manufacturer bc they have a 3 month money back guarentee but they stated that they won't honor it since amazon has only a 1 month return policy
customer_reviews.author: loretta rideout

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat 👍
customer_reviews.text: At first, our cat was very skeptical of this litter box. However, we followed the instructions (as hard as it may be to leave a dirty litter box for a few days) and to my delight, our cat started using the cat genie. our cat is happier than ever, having a perfectly clean litter box every time he goes. And we are happy because there's no smell in the house at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory, but I am having issues with it
customer_reviews.text: I love the machine, and the thought of never having to clean the cat box again. However, for some reason, my unit will rum for over an hour! It keeps beeping during the “drying” phase. It beeps, turns off, then starts again. I tried allowing it to keep running so it can complete the cycle, but it never stops. Is there a reset switch or something to start it over?? Help!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Wissinger

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our two cats. After initial setup it flooded our laundry room floor. Called customer service and they were very pleasant to deal with. Finally got it working. Cats finally started to use it, however, after the first cleaning mode it did not clean out all the feces and then went into the drying mode which put the odar throughout our whole house. It smelled so bad we unhooked it and put it outside in our garage. Will be returning for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: scott odell

customer_reviews.title: Basically will never scoop again
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My cat took to it instantly, however he has colitis (bad colon) so his stools are often soft small pebbles and will occasionally get missed or squished. Which then heats them and they get nice and smelly. It doesn’t happen every time and he also has such smelly poops he will clear the bathroom, even he will vacate for an hour or so. It does a great job at cleaning and is very efficient, we only scoop if a little bit is left behind and again not very frequently at all. So all in all great product, I just have a weird pooping smelly cat.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany D.

customer_reviews.title: Cats took a while to get used to it
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, there is still a little litter that gets on the floor but it is clean litter because it washes after each use. No more dumping or scooping old litter. I have had it for about 6 weeks. I started out without the additional walls and cover. I now have the walls and cover in place and that reduces the amount of litter that escapes the cat genie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Works beautifully, cat uses it without hesitation. The one time it stopped working I called customer service and they walked me through figuring out what was wrong. A small part had broken and they sent a replacement right away. Five star product and five star service. (I bought this six years ago.)
customer_reviews.author: lajrp

customer_reviews.title: defective unit replacement handled improperly by the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I tried installing it and first the water source connection was faulty. I bought a hose splitter which worked great until I received the replacement part a week later. Then the catgenie leaked a bit from underneath -the waste water after a cycle. I contacted them again and they said they would send out a new base. I received just the shell of the base which would require me to change out all of the other parts. They didn't even send instructions. WTH? So now I have to do their work and disassemble and reassemble the unit because the brand new one never worked in the first place?
customer_reviews.author: NXL

customer_reviews.title: Stinks up the entire house
customer_reviews.text: Well, I had high hopes for this and hoped to be able to stop cleaning after the cat but this thing stinks up the entire house. It is set to auto clean after the cat uses the litter box. But for some reason even using the fresh scent cleaning solution, every so often it just causes the entire house to smell. We are likely going back to regular litter.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I have had two and love them
customer_reviews.text: We have ran these boxes for years..has a few problems with long hair cats, the pump drain clogs that is a head ache and the will rubber washer at the pump drain can break down and the pump will not pump...Even with these few learning curves I still love it, We had to move and have no way to set ours up yet and one of the cats has all ready had a UTI from using LITTER.............So yes I love it and I do highly recommend it, also on a side note there customer service is great great....they call back and are extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Robin V. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Better than other "self-cleaning" litter boxes
customer_reviews.text: This is the only self-cleaning litter box that gets close to actually being self-cleaning. It still requires some effort (because cats don't always aim well), but overall it beats every other solution we have tried over the past 19 years.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this!! No more hauling heavy litter and scooping!!! Its in my basement hooked up at the washing machine hook up. Make sure you have plenty of cartridges on hand, I write the date on it when it is installed. Also when the error says not draining you need to take it apart and clean it. ( Should be done every 3 or 4 months) I took mine outside to the water hose!! Call Cat Genie and they are so helpful!! My cats took right to it, I kept their litter box close to it the 1st week and then got rid of it!! My husband is happy too!!
customer_reviews.author: Otis

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would make for cleaner, less costly environment for fam and cats. Has become total problem, breaking down, non-cost efficient... very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: CatGenie broken and nothing can be done to fix after 2 year warranty has expired.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the CatGenie 5 years ago and about a year ago, it stopped taking in the Sanisolution. Called the customer service and was informed that there is nothing they can do to fix the problem because it is beyond the 2 year warranty. They will not fix the needle that intakes the solution nor will they sell you the part for you to fix it yourself. Now, I’m left with 4 sanisolution cartridge which are around $20 each and an unusable CatGenie. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Lo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the Unit Shipped
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received was defective. At the factory workers failed to install a critical red gasket on the drain hose fitting. When the unit was tested it leaked. After attempts to install the provided replacement gasket (with no specific instructions in the manual), a second trial run resulted in the drain hose blowing off fixed tubing and flooding the bathroom. Negotiating now to try to get a properly constructed Cat Genie that doesn't require me to do what should have been done correctly at the factory!
customer_reviews.author: NanaReads

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Can never go back to a regular litter box. It’s the difference between a potty potty/outhouse and a clean running water toilet with automatic flush for humans. Frees up a lot of time. House smells better. Cats love it. Over a year now and no problems. If you have multiple cats, I do recommend buying two CatGenies, because the cleaning cycles take a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Made my house smell like a sewer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Turned cat poop from solid to stringy like consistency. When it was ran it made our 3300 sqft house smell like a sewer. Seriously, we could barely breathe. Lit multiple candles and opened windows. Ran it 3 times and still did nothing for the cat poop. It also somehow flung cat poop outside the box! Will be returning this machine. If you’re looking for the best automatic litter box buy a Litter Robot.
customer_reviews.author: Rox

customer_reviews.title: Learn from my mistake !
customer_reviews.text: The biggest $300 hassle I’ve ever dealt with . You have to have a very very particular setup and space for this thing to drain properly and not leak . And ALOT of room, it is huge ! I ended up returning mine 🙁 the invention is a good idea but you might as well teach your kitty to potty in a toilet for the space and hassle of this thing .. ALSO : thank god I bought it on amazon because the original website does not pay for return shipping .
customer_reviews.author: Emerald Griseta

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tell I have two cats in house
customer_reviews.text: I love I don’t have to Scoop or do anything it cleans it self beautifully. Should be taken apart and deep cleaned. I clean mine every 3 to 4 months. This is my second one purchased I liked it so much after six years the heater stopped working
customer_reviews.author: John garrett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had power failure then when restarted it seemed to not function and couldn't handle the poop.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Renee Adams

customer_reviews.title: Needs lots of improvements
customer_reviews.text: Once they get the bugs out of the user interface and change the granules so they don't track everywhere, it will be a great product. Update: My opinion continually gets lower. Errors occur too often at any time, with flashing lights and beeps impossible to ignore and difficult to interpret. Operating costs are high. I suspect there's a process of loosening over time that results in litter not getting shaken off the scoop, so it gets flushed away and a box that's supposed to last 4-6 months lasts less than a month. Tracking is a major problem. I'm going back to the old litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible while cleaning
customer_reviews.text: The claims made about the CatGenie 120 being odor free are far from true. The scooping process leaves behind small bits of poo that release an unimaginably foul odor when the drying process starts. It did this right out of the box on the second cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Water sensor is no good
customer_reviews.text: You have to clean the water sensor at least once a week or I'll keep beeping. And the first water sensor wouldn't even work I had to put a backup 1 in
customer_reviews.author: Robert Minder

customer_reviews.title: Keep the toilet hose hidden from your cats
customer_reviews.text: I do really like the cleanliness of the cat genie and the cats are still getting used to it. The biggest problem i have is with the hook that goes on the toilet. We had it under the seat for awhile but people were forgetting to take it out when they went to the bathroom, so we decided to go with over the toilet seat. Well we have Savannah cats and I should have seen this coming... They destroyed the hose to the cat genie already and it has been less than month. So I am not sure the best solution for this but it is a good idea to keep the hose out of sight from your cats.
customer_reviews.author: MountainKat

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This has changed our lives! We have two cats and this has been a game changer for us. We have had it for a few months now and we haven’t had to do a single thing since we put it together! There is no longer any litter box smells or clumps of litter on the floor. My only hesitation in owning cars was the litter box and now that’s been solved!
customer_reviews.author: cling

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Warning, this product is addictive, worst than opioids. I just bought my second one, the first lasted over 5 years with my fiancés cat going in it what seems 10 times a day, I think the cat liked hiding in it. This device was so good my fiancé asked for a replacement for her 70th birthday present. Thanks Cat Genie for making a great product and an easy birthday present!
customer_reviews.author: james cohen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I don’t have to clean a nasty cat box anymore! The fresh scent is amazing & I can tell when the box has been cleaned because the whole house smells nice. Only downsides are it misses the really tiny poo pieces with the scooper & when it needs to be troubleshooted (troubleshot?), your cat(s) are stuck without a box. As a vet tech, you also aren’t able to monitor your pet’s bathroom habits in case of medical problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well after the several weeks it took me to find correct fittings for our plumbing. This is also a great product if you like cat litter spread throughout your entire house. The washable granules that this thing uses get tracked all over your house no matter what mats or anti tracking measures you have in place. Other than that, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.text: High maintenance. It WILL NOT function without their EXPENSIVE SaniSolution. Drain clogs often. Goes through a lot of washable granules, you'll find them all over your house.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick V

customer_reviews.title: A very expensive cat bed
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use it because the connections don't fit our plumbing and customer service was unable to assist us. But customer service gave us the runaround and not helpful. It has now become a very expensive cat bed.
customer_reviews.author: SJH Designs

customer_reviews.title: Huge mess, litter everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The main issue I have with this box is the litter. It is all over all 3 levels of my home. The litter clings to my cat due to static my cat enters the box and when they leave they have litter stuck to their paws and underbelly. It would be great if the manufacture figured this issue out or at least warned us as a buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: and

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: it stopped working after few days, and my cat started pooping on the bed and rug... I rather use litter box than relying on this product that has stopped working. First of all this product does not work. I have escalated my issue directly with seller and have not heard anything back. The product stop working in few days after I received it. Its sitting in my storage room from last 6 months. I have requested refund due to defective product but no response. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Patadia

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: to costly to have to buy cartridges as often as i do. Every 3 weeks it cost me $24 and then it doesnt always clean good, about every 2 weeks i have to run it thru a extra cycle to get rid of the horrible odder
customer_reviews.author: Hisiisonme

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of cats. I know not all of the cats are going to use it. It took about 3 days for them to start using it but only for urinating. Since I have so many cats I can't take away all the litterpan's but having one less box to clean is worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: This is Awesome but make sure you have room for it because it is big
customer_reviews.text: I love cats but hate to clean a liter box. This is awesome. I would love to put this in my laundry room but my washer actually drains into my pond and did not want the waste going into my pond so it takes up a good portion of my bathroom but is definitely worth it. No issues so far and the instructions have detailed how to for common problems. My last auto clean box was no where near as nice and lasted two months before it broke. This is well built and hope it last a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Carmon L

customer_reviews.title: Dont BUY
customer_reviews.text: You have to buy cartridges, cant refill them. Over priced and not worth the money unless you like burning money.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby J.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t cat genie
customer_reviews.text: Third time buying cat genie it stopped working after 3 months, cat genie first stated too much time had past to issue a refund and when they did approve my refund I had to return it at my cost of $87.00. I will never trust cat genie again and my refund was not a full refund only $250.00 of the $277.00 I paid
customer_reviews.author: Love boxers

customer_reviews.title: Always break after several months
customer_reviews.text: We are on our third unit and each one has stopped functioning after several months. We tried contacting manufacturer for new electronic board, etc. but never was able to fix the unit. Too bad because when it works it's great
customer_reviews.author: L. Hermes

customer_reviews.title: Works About as Well as My Brother In Law
customer_reviews.text: We have had this cat genie for 16 months now. It worked great for the first two months and really hasn't worked much since. (Kind of like my brother-in-law Jake). The problems with it are that the fill hose leaks (not much, but enough to leave a puddle once a day) and it doesn't dry the litter at all. Since the litter is always damp, the cats refuse to use it. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS ITEM. YOU WILL REGRET IT. You will spend plenty of time trying to get it to work and wind up frustrated like me, giving the product bad reviews online. Please don't wind up like me. Avoid purchasing this piece of cat poop.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Great product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far so good on the cat genie. We’ve had it a couple of months and it has done everything that was advertised. Would give it 5 stars but it’s very loud. That’s my only complaint so far. If you don’t want to scoop cat litter anymore I suggest trying this out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more smelly litter box!?- here take my money! :)
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Worth every penny! We actually bought a used one of these machines a couple of years ago. It broke, but my frugal husband was so impressed with its design he agreed to a new one! I no longer have to clean the litter box and he no longer has to smell cat poop! Haha. (1 cat household).
customer_reviews.author: Mandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure about this product due to price but decided to give it a try and we love it, it’s so much better than scooping litter, my family loved it so much I bought one for my daughter for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: sharon sampson

customer_reviews.title: No scoop.
customer_reviews.text: Cool cat box.. the down side is the noise and the installation had to go pick up $25 in brass to make it work ..
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Best Litterbox Ever
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product!!! I was reading some of the negative reviews and quite frankly, I don’t think people know how to set it up. I’ve had one for many years and it has worked almost flawlessly the whole time. If I do have any gripe it’s about the litter getting tracked out now and then but compared to real litter?? No contest. Hands down the best thing ever made for cat owners. Don’t listen to the negative reviews. They obviously don’t have a clue as to what they are doing. (Tip- Put the drain in your washer drain tube. Life will be better)
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mills

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money! If you have EVER had to scoop cat litter, you know what a disgusting job it is. This machine is the best invention of all time for cat owners!!! I have two cats and since owning this gem, I have not had to lift one finger to scoop cat litter. So worth the money. Buy it!!! You won’t regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing in the sense that I never have to clean out my cat box ever again, but for the price my two biggest disappointments that are causing me much frustration are: 1. The tracking of litter is worse than anything I’ve ever had (but at least it’s clean litter). 2. The litter has no odor control and is exacerbated during the cleaning cycle. I can smell it almost anywhere in my house and it’s awful. But I think I’ll just need to set it to clean when I’m gone or sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fagerlin

customer_reviews.title: the best liter box
customer_reviews.text: totally worth the price! we have 2 of these and no more scooping cat poop!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy S.

customer_reviews.title: Needs a plumber to set-up and a project to clean
customer_reviews.text: If you have a home built in the past year you’ll need a plumber for attaching this to the cold water line in your bathroom. The t-fitting is older model and made for newer homes.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Box
customer_reviews.text: We have had this cat box for a time and got a 2nd one because we got 2 more kittens and wow so glad we did. If one is going they have the other one works out great! 4 cats in all.
customer_reviews.author: Denise-n-Hank

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and install.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this litter box. I bought it in September of 2017 and it still works perfectly. I have had literally zero issues with this, my cat loves it and I don’t have to deal with a nasty litter box. Since owning it I have taken it apart once to clean it which I think is recommended but that was extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Jammed every time...
customer_reviews.text: Jammed every time it ran - had to return. Seemed too good to be true (apparently it was).
customer_reviews.author: Kristian D. Guntzelman

customer_reviews.title: Motor out in just over a year
customer_reviews.text: I have had my cat genie since May 2018. It’s now August 2019 and the motor has gone out and it clogs constantly
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: BBB Rating D- for Petnovations CatGenie
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason they have this rating. The product does not do what it says and they don't care because they don't have to care. They will ask you to return the item for their "tech team" to look at and then tell amazon that you didn't. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Marx

customer_reviews.title: Broke after as few months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January and it already stopped working. We tried everything to fix it but was unable to get it to work correctly. You never know when it's going to stop working so the cat has no where to go so she goes out side of it on the floor. The litter plugs up the tube and the bowl fills with water and the cat will not use it. Very expensive for something that only works for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had started to have some real problems lugging cat litter into the house and then bagging up dirty litter and getting it out o
customer_reviews.text: I have had it almost a year now and it has proved to be a real labor saver for me. I had it on manual for the first month, but found that by putting it on cat auto I have no smells at all and it works every time. I had started to have some real problems lugging cat litter into the house and then bagging up dirty litter and getting it out of the house, no problems now.
customer_reviews.author: Beth In NC

customer_reviews.title: My cats were not interested in using the Cat - Genie under any circumstances.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a pretty cool product. I just wish my cats would have used the cat-genie. You can see by Jacks face he was not happy at all about how loud the unit is during the scoop, wash and dry cycle. I looked at all of the literature and Utube videos for tips and hints to get your cats to use the cat-genie. I did reach out to the cat-Genie people through Amazon and did not get a response. Thankfully Amazon authorized my return and credit to our account. I did clean the unit before returning. I'm out about 65$ for the cleaning supplies because they will not take them back because of some shipping regulation.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I got this after I found out I was pregnant. It's been a lifesaver. I don't have to ask my husband to clean the box and I don't have to struggle to get down onto the floor to do it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: No more cat odor!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and it is great to not have to clean up after them.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree T Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Older cats may not use.
customer_reviews.text: Have older cats would not use,think you must start them as kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Blankenbiller

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product could NOT be installed anywhere in our townhome. A waste of hard earned money
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. K

customer_reviews.title: Love this litter box
customer_reviews.text: I got a distracting cat where if her litter isn’t clean she poops everywhere but the litter. After getting this litter box she doesn’t do that anymore. She took to this so fast I was over the moon. I love the small and it’s great that I don’t have to clean it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kilika

product_meta.title: CatGenie Self Washing Self Flushing Cat Box
product_meta.description: Style:Cat BoxCatGenie, The world's only self-washing cat box. You will never touch, change or buy cat litter again. The CatGenie Secret? Washable Granules, not litter. Collecting cat waste in a box of litter is unsanitary. Cleaning the mess out is unpleasant and carrying heavy cat litter in and of the home is just a waste. The CatGenie is dust, germ, odor, and litter free and automatically washes, sanitizes and dries itself. CatGenie has a Two-Year Warranty. Easy DIY set-up. Recommended setup locations: Bathroom (toilet) -If you have a rigid water line in your bathroom, you may need to replace it with a flexible one) or Utility/laundry room. When you purchase the CatGenie, everything needed to make your home litter free is included: The only tools needed are a wrench or a pair of pliers. Some non-standard hookups may require additional parts not provided by PetNovations, Inc. Included supplies should last 2-3 months for 1 cat and about 2 months for two cats. Several custom Cat Activation Choices- Cat 1 - 14 straight hours active, 10 hours sleep time (you choose when it is on) with a 10 minute delay after the cat uses it to clean Cat 2 - 14 straight hours active, 10 hours sleep time (you choose when it is on) with a 30 minute delay. For multiple cats giving them time to use it before it cleans Cat 3- 24-hours active, with a 10-minute delay after the cat uses it to clean Cat 4 – 24-hours active with a 30-minute delay. For multiple cats giving them time to use it before it cleans The CatGenie is the greenest cat box ever and quite possibly, the most economical. The plastic in the SaniSolution Cartridge is recyclable (unlike cat litter). Each cartridge holds 120 washes and when set on Cat Activation provide 240 washes (A year supply of Cartridges takes up less space and uses less plastic than one container/1 month's supply of cat litter).
feature_bullets: Includes 1 CatGenie (Non-A.I. Model) Unit, 1 Box Washable Granules, 1 SaniSolution Cartridge
Eliminates cat litter from your life. Uses litter-like, Washable Granules that never need changing.
Washes itself clean with Veterinarian-approved SaniSolution and water after every cat visit.
Your cat will always find a box that is not only clump free, it’s waste, dust and odor free.
Includes 2-Year Warranty. Customer Support Available 7 Days Per Week.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
